##Assumed:

You have git installed on PC

You have RStudio and R installed on PC

Have a github account with a shell(empty) repository created


##Integrating Rstudio with Gitub:

Go to Tools-> Global Options -> Git/SVN

Check the "Enable Version control for RStudio projects"

Add appropriate path for the git executable in the text box 


For more help on this i used https://datasciencespecialization.github.io/toolbox/
